text: Kasturbai "Kasturba" Mohandas Gandhi ( born Kasturbai Makhanji Kapadia on (11 April 1869 â€“ 22 February 1944) was an Indian political activist. She was the wife of Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi. Like her husband, she was involved in the Indian independence movement in British-ruled India. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Indian activists
title: Kasturba Gandhi
